com.sabres

Class Sabres

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sabres.Sabres

  • public final class Sabres
extends java.lang.Object
    The Sabres class contains static functions that handle global configuration and debug faculties for the Sabres library.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static bolts.Task<java.lang.Void> deleteDatabase()
      Deletes the Sabres Database.
      static void deleteDatabase(DeleteCallback callback)
      Deletes the Sabres Database.

      Configures and initializes Sabres library.
      static void printIndices()
      Prints all indices that exist in Sabres.
      static <T extends SabresObject>
      void      		 printSchema(java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
      Print the Schema for a specific SabresObject
      static void printTables()
      Prints all tables that exist in Sabres with row counts.
      static void setDebug(boolean debug)
      Setting the debug flag to true will start printing all sql commands generated by the Sabres library.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • setDebug

        public static void setDebug(boolean debug)
        Setting the debug flag to true will start printing all sql commands generated by the Sabres library.
        Parameters:
        debug - true to print all sql commands, false to disable printing.

      • initialize

        public static void initialize(Context context)
        Configures and initializes Sabres library.

        This must be called before your application can use the Sabres library. The recommended way is to put a call to Sabres.initialize in your Application's onCreate method: 

         
 public class MyApplication extends Application {
     public void onCreate() {
         super.onCreate();
         Sabres.initialize(this);
     }
 }
        Parameters:
        context - The active Context for your application.

      • printTables

        public static void printTables()
        Prints all tables that exist in Sabres with row counts.

      • printIndices

        public static void printIndices()
        Prints all indices that exist in Sabres.

      • printSchema

        public static <T extends SabresObject> void printSchema(java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
        Print the Schema for a specific SabresObject
        Parameters:
        clazz - The object class to print.

      • deleteDatabase

        public static void deleteDatabase(DeleteCallback callback)
        Deletes the Sabres Database.
        Parameters:
        callback - callback.done will be called when the operation completes

      • deleteDatabase

        public static bolts.Task<java.lang.Void> deleteDatabase()
        Deletes the Sabres Database.
        Returns:
        A task that resolves when the delete finish.
